text: khea (chu xib) klaw wa “thæcring chan txngkar thi ca hı than smrs kab luksaw khn hnung nı sxng khn ni doy than ca txng thangan hı chan 8 pi læa tha than thadi khrb 10 pi k pen khwam di thima cak than chan mi txngkar thi ca thakhwam labak hı than xin cha xallxh than ca phb chan xyu nı hmu khn di”
